title: Why Satanic Panic never really ended | What's the Story?
description:
One of the most famous moral panics in history, the Satanic Panic, may have been at its peak in the 80s, but did it ever really go away? Vox culture writer Aja Romano walks up through the history of this fear of the occult from the Mason family to Lil Nas X.
Read Aja Romano’s full story at Vox.com
